General.Name: Mason Capital Corporation
General.Description: Mason Capital Corporation engages in the finance business in South Korea. It is also involved in the facility rental and lease, technology, credit finance, and investment businesses. The company was formerly known as CXC Investment & Credit Capital Corporation and changed its name to Mason Capital Corporation in July 2016. Mason Capital Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jeonju-si, South Korea.
General.Address: Jeonju Daewoo Building, Jeonju-si, South Korea
